feed.title: blind symmetric commitment for stronger byzantine voting resilience (Re: bitcoin taint & unilateral revocability)

entry.title: blind symmetric commitment for stronger byzantine voting resilience (Re: bitcoin taint & unilateral revocability)
entry.summary: The speaker is currently occupied with pre-conference work and is not entirely up to date on the current conversation. However, they note that it bears a resemblance to the "guy fawkes" protocol previously considered by Zooko about a year ago.
